availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Howard T. Jennings (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy T. Jennings. Father of John T. Jennings, Margarett A. Jennings, L. Jennings, Joseph L. Jennings, Robert Jennings, Crawford A. Jennings, Mary N. Jennings, and Sallie D. Jennings. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 262A-B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 35. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District No. 8, p. 28. Find A Grave, "Howard Todd Jennings (1815-1882)," Memorial #51891886, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=51891886&ref=acom (accessed September 21, 2017).
